c:capability.name: CentraLiteSmartPlug
c:capability.c:description: Model for the Z-Wave side of the CentraLite.

c:method.name: SetLearnMode
c:method.description: Causes the Z-Wave side of the device to enter into learn mode for the specified duration.

c:method.name: SendNif
c:method.description: Causes the Z-Wave side of the device to send a NIF frame.

c:method.name: Reset
c:method.description: Causes the Z-Wave side of the device to reset.

c:method.name: Pair
c:method.description: Attempt to pair the Z-Wave side of the device.

c:method.name: Query
c:method.description: Attempt to determine the Z-Wave side node and home id.
